channel.title: Milestone 3 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: For this milestone, you will be creating an additional class to represent an Order, defining an IOrderItem interface to represent items added to an order, and refactoring your existing classes to implement this interface. You will also be writing unit tests, creating a UML diagram of your Data project, and adding any missing XML-style documentation. General requirements: You need to follow the style laid out in the C# Coding Conventions
